definition: to observe/to obey/to follow/to comply with
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: Take medication as directed, it provides the best pain control.
sentences.chinese: 遵照指示服藥，如此提供最佳的疼痛控制。

sentences.english: Enforce general controller's instruction, not allow taking action individually.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格遵照總指揮長的指示決不冒然行事。

sentences.english: She follwed out her mother's advice.
sentences.chinese: 她完全遵照她母親的建議。

sentences.english: If you insist， I will comply with your request.
sentences.chinese: 如果你堅持，我們會遵照你的要求。

sentences.english: The partner strategy is a page from Microsoft’s old playbook.
sentences.chinese: 與這些夥伴的戰略關係還是遵照微軟的老辦法簽署。

sentences.english: If you use chlorine tablets or iodine tablets, follow the directions that come with the tablets.
sentences.chinese: 如果你使用氯片或碘片，遵照藥片附帶的指示使用。

sentences.english: Please earnestly comply and put into practice.
"We're following Admiral Patterson's orders to the letter, " Lash said.
sentences.chinese: “我們嚴格遵照皮特遜將軍的命令，”拉稀說道。

sentences.english: Answer restaurant phone within 3 rings, using correct salutations and telephone etiquette.
sentences.chinese: 遵照正確的電話禮儀在電話鈴響3聲之內接起電話。

sentences.english: Consistent with our agreement with the Iraqi government, all U. S. troops will leave by the end of next year.
sentences.chinese: 遵照與伊拉克締結的協議，所有美軍將於明年底撤離。

sentences.english: I wrote to her in pursuance of your instruction.
sentences.chinese: 我遵照您的指示給她寫了信。

sentences.english: The judicial procedures in Qing was that the related departments tried cases in accordance with certain forms and formulas.
sentences.chinese: 清代的司法程序是承審官司遵照一定程式去審理案件。

sentences.english: Non respecting of this will result in a rejected leg.
sentences.chinese: 如若沒有遵照機型限制要求，此航段將不會得到批准。

sentences.english: On/At your suggestion I bought the more expensive model.
sentences.chinese: 遵照你的建議，我買了較貴的型號。

sentences.english: Please always use this form for incorporation in Deleware.
sentences.chinese: 涉及在特拉華州成立的公司，請遵照以上格式填寫。

sentences.english: Comply with the compatible rule of complement when usingcompliments.
sentences.chinese: 應用答候語時遵照剜語的相容規矩。

definition: to comply with/to follow (directives)/to defer (to the judgment of superiors)
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to comply with/to abide by/to respect (an agreement)
to listen and obey/to comply with/to heed/to hearken
to observe/to obey/to follow/to comply with
to go against/to be contrary to/to violate
according to/in accordance with/in the light of/on the basis of
